message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate it. While I'm interested in the product, $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. How about $105?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I think the product is really worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $112.50
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $112.50 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to go up to $107.50.  Let's split the difference and make this deal happen.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $108, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product brings
